profileAlternative.name: Thomas Franquelin
profileAlternative.headline: CTO at AdAlong
profileAlternative.summary: I have been working in the software industry for around 10 years, in a variety of roles and technologies, for companies big and small, including my own. Always interested in technical challenges, and how they can push the business forward.

aboutAlternative.text: I have been working in the software industry for around 10 years, in a variety of roles and technologies, for companies big and small, including my own. Always interested in technical challenges, and how they can push the business forward.

positions.title: Staff Software Engineer
positions.description: Technical supervision of the Data Engineering team (10-15 engineers). Technologies used: Scala, Spark, Elasticsearch, ClickHouse, and many more.

positions.title: Cofounder
positions.description: In collaboration with Andrea Fiore, creation of www.citycontext.com, an API that provided a curated access to local Open Data.

positions.title: Time Out Group
positions.description:
- Responsible for the design and implementation of our data integration layer, in Scala
- Line-manage a team of 5-10 engineers
- Acts as the team's Scrum Master and prioritise tickets
- Reports on team's progression

positions.title:
Title
Tech Lead
positions.description:
- Responsible for the design and implementation of our data integration layer, in Scala
- Line-manage a team of 5-10 engineers
- Acts as the team's Scrum Master and prioritise tickets
- Reports on team's progression

positions.title:
Title
Contract Scala Software Engineer
positions.description:
- Helped recreating the Scala Team almost from scratch. Together with the other Scala tech lead, we hired 6 Scala developers and 2 Scala contractors
- Transfered the knowledge from the previous team to the new one.

positions.title: Cofounder
positions.description: In collaboration with Andrea Fiore and Emmanuelle Poirier, creation of a property website that goes beyond the classified approach. It uses a variety of public data to feed a matching algorithm for property rental. It is implemented in Scala, and backed by Postgres/PostGIS.

positions.title: Contract Scala Software Engineer
positions.description: Work on the subscribe.theguardian.com and membership.theguardian.com platforms, using AWS and Scala.

positions.title: Cofounder
positions.description: Contracting partnership that worked with several clients, including The Ministry of Justice, The App Business, Appear Here, Pan Studio, Farmdrop and Optinomics. We specialized in Ruby and Haskell.

positions.title: Contract Ruby Software Engineer
positions.description: Refactoring of a data integration platform on a mobile sport application for a major news company

positions.title: Contract Ruby Software Engineer
positions.description: Bootstrap an exchange platform website for a charity using Ruby On Rails

positions.title: Contract Ruby Software Engineer
positions.description: Development on the Ruby on Rails platform to make it transactional.

given.text:
Thomas est une des personnes avec laquelle je partage le plus ma vision du monde informatique en ce qui concerne les orientations, la réutilisation, les méthodologies, le hype vs ce qui est vraiment utile. Thomas est également conscient des désillusions ou réalités des contextes réels d'interventions qui parfois nous font dévier, à tord ou à raison, de nos idéaux d'informaticiens. Thomas est un visionnaire, un entrepreneur et un théoricien en une seule personne; il sait ce qu'il faudrait faire de mieux; il sait ce qui ne fonctionnera pas et il prend l'initiative pour faire ce qu'il faut dans les circonstances et ça marche très bien.
…
See more
Thomas is a talented developer who looks at providing solutions to the business' problems. He's focused on delivering quality work with an attention on maintainability and reuse.

received.text: Cédric is a multi-faceted war-time team leader. He is able to understand what goes in his troops' head, while always keeping an eye on the bottom line. He showed us multiple times that he was able to get down to the fine-grained understanding of a technical matter when need be, but always  keeping in mind his company's interests.

peopleAlsoViewed.text: Regional Sales Manager S-EMEA at Trifacta
Chief Transformation Officer and Executive Assistant to EVP Engineering & Maintenance chez Air France
